title: Brand Parameters
description: Schema for defining Catalyst brand-level parameters, with UI/UX metadata and logical grouping.

directVotingPrivacyState.title: Direct Voting Privacy State
directVotingPrivacyState.description: Whether direct voting privacy is enabled.
directVotingPrivacyState.x-guidance: Set to true if direct voting privacy is required.

minimumBudgetRequestPerProposal.title: Minimum Budget Request Per Proposal
minimumBudgetRequestPerProposal.description: The minimum ADA amount that can be requested per proposal.
minimumBudgetRequestPerProposal.x-guidance: Specify the minimum allowed budget per proposal in ADA.

maximumBudgetRequestPerProposal.title: Maximum Budget Request Per Proposal
maximumBudgetRequestPerProposal.description: The maximum ADA amount (variable per challenge/category) that can be requested per proposal.
maximumBudgetRequestPerProposal.x-guidance: Specify the maximum allowed budget per proposal.

maximumProposalsPerProposer.title: Maximum Proposals per Proposer/co-proposer
maximumProposalsPerProposer.description: The maximum number of proposals a proposer or co-proposer can submit.
maximumProposalsPerProposer.x-guidance: Set the limit for proposals per proposer/co-proposer.

communityReviewerRegistration.title: Community Reviewer Registration
communityReviewerRegistration.description: Information or rules about community reviewer registration.
communityReviewerRegistration.x-guidance: Describe the process or requirements for community reviewer registration.

votingPowerThreshold.title: Voting Power Threshold
votingPowerThreshold.description: The minimum Lovelace required to participate in voting.
votingPowerThreshold.x-guidance: Specify the minimum voting power threshold in Lovelace.

tallyingOptimization.title: Tallying Optimization
tallyingOptimization.description: The ratio or formula used for tallying optimization.
tallyingOptimization.x-guidance: Provide the formula or ratio for tallying optimization.

proposalAcceptanceThreshold.title: Proposal Acceptance Threshold
proposalAcceptanceThreshold.description: The percentage threshold for proposal acceptance.
proposalAcceptanceThreshold.x-guidance: Set the acceptance threshold as a percentage.
